topBar.specialOffer: Take advantage of our special offer on web development services!

aboveTheFold.description: We develop innovative technological solutions that drive your business into the future.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a selection of our most requested services, tailored to drive your business towards technological success.

linkPages.title: Link Pages
benefits: Easy management of all your links.

portfolio.title: Digital Portfolio
portfolio.description: Showcase your work and skills online
benefits: Professional design that highlights your work.

digitalMenu.title: Digital Menu
benefits: Easily update your dishes and prices.

services.ctaText: Didn't find what you're looking for?

promotionalBanner.bannerText1: Increase your visibility and attract new customers with a Website available 24/7.
promotionalBanner.bannerText2: Responsive design, SEO optimization and guaranteed technical support.

workflow.createWireframes: Create wireframes and define user experience (UX/UI).
workflow.publishProject: Publish the project in the production environment.

freeConsultation.title: Free Web Development Consultation
freeConsultation.description: Do you want to take your business to the next level? Our team of web development experts is here to help you. We offer free consultation to create a custom and functional website that fits your company's needs. Optimize your online presence and increase your visibility with a modern and professional platform.

identitySection.title: Corporate Identity
identitySection.description1: Corporate identity is much more than just a logo. It is how your company presents itself to the world, defining who you are, how you communicate, and how your customers perceive you.
identitySection.description2: Our team will help you build an identity that reflects your values and resonates with your audience.

supportBanner.title: 24/7 Support
supportBanner.subtitle: Always available to help you
supportBanner.contactInfo: Need assistance? Our team is available 24 hours a day to answer your questions and help you succeed.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.description: Our clients recommend us for the quality of our services. Here are some of their testimonials. Your opinion also matters!
testimonials.testimonial2: Excellent service, very kind and professional.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
faq.answer2: You can contact our support team via email at info@digitaldevlab.com or via WhatsApp.
faq.question3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer3: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

blog.title: Explore Our Blog
blog.introText1: Dive into a world of knowledge and personal growth.
blog.introText2: In our blog, you will find inspiring articles, practical tips, and valuable resources that will transform your daily life.
blog.subTitle: Tips and Inspiring Stories
blog.description: Discover guides on personal development and stories of people who have overcome great challenges. Find the inspiration and resources you need to improve in various aspects of your life.

podcast.title: Technology Podcast
podcast.description: Join us on our podcast where we discuss the latest technological innovations, trends, and much more.

episode1.title: Episode 1: Artificial Intelligence
episode1.description: Explore the impact of AI on everyday life.

episode2.title: Episode 2: Augmented Reality
episode2.description: Discover how AR is changing the way we interact with the world.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Discover the solutions we offer to elevate your business.

service1.title: Web Development
service1.description: Build robust and scalable web applications tailored to your needs.

service2.title: Digital Portfolios
service2.description: Showcase your work with stunning digital portfolios that attract clients.

service3.title: Corporate Identity Solutions
service3.description: Create a strong brand identity with our custom solutions.
